changeSet.createView: select algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationId, algorithmImplementation1.guid, algorithmImplementation1.insertedRowDate, algorithmImplementation1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeVersionId, algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationName, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationClass , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmTypeVersion1.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmTypeVersion_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.guid as algorithmTypeVersion_guid , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , executorType1.executorTypeId as executorType_executorTypeId , executorType1.guid as executorType_guid , executorType1.insertedRowDate as executorType_insertedRowDate , executorType1.lastUpdatedDate as executorType_lastUpdatedDate , executorType1.executorTypeName as executorType_executorTypeName , executorType1.executorTypeClass as executorType_executorTypeClass from algorithmImplementation algorithmImplementation1 join algorithmTypeVersion algorithmTypeVersion1 on algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeVersionId = algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId join executorType executorType1 on algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId = executorType1.executorTypeId;

select algorithmOutput1.algorithmOutputId, algorithmOutput1.guid, algorithmOutput1.insertedRowDate, algorithmOutput1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmOutput1.algorithmRunId, algorithmOutput1.algorithmOutputTypeId, algorithmOutput1.executorStorageViewId, algorithmOutput1.outputPath , algorithmOutputType1.algorithmOutputTypeId as algorithmOutputType_algorithmOutputTypeId , algorithmOutputType1.guid as algorithmOutputType_guid , algorithmOutputType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmOutputType_insertedRowDate , algorithmOutputType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmOutputType_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmOutputType1.algorithmOutputTypeName as algorithmOutputType_algorithmOutputTypeName , executorStorageView1.executorStorageViewId as executorStorageView_executorStorageViewId , executorStorageView1.guid as executorStorageView_guid , executorStorageView1.insertedRowDate as executorStorageView_insertedRowDate , executorStorageView1.lastUpdatedDate as executorStorageView_lastUpdatedDate , executorStorageView1.executorStorageSnapshotId as executorStorageView_executorStorageSnapshotId , executorStorageView1.executorStorageId as executorStorageView_executorStorageId , executorStorageView1.sourceDownloadId as executorStorageView_sourceDownloadId , executorStorageView1.sourceViewId as executorStorageView_sourceViewId , executorStorageView1.storagePath as executorStorageView_storagePath , executorStorageView1.viewSize as executorStorageView_viewSize , executorStorageView1.viewRowsCount as executorStorageView_viewRowsCount , executorStorageView1.isValid as executorStorageView_isValid from algorithmOutput algorithmOutput1 join algorithmOutputType algorithmOutputType1 on algorithmOutput1.algorithmOutputTypeId = algorithmOutputType1.algorithmOutputTypeId join executorStorageView executorStorageView1 on algorithmOutput1.executorStorageViewId = executorStorageView1.executorStorageViewId;

algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeId, algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId as algorithmParam_algorithmParamId , algorithmParam1.guid as algorithmParam_guid , algorithmParam_algorithmParamName , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamDescription as algorithmParam_algorithmParamDescription , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamType as algorithmParam_algorithmParamType , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmType_algorithmTypeId , algorithmType1.guid as algorithmType_guid , algorithmType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmType_insertedRowDate , algorithmType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmType_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeName as algorithmType_algorithmTypeName , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeDescription as algorithmType_algorithmTypeDescription , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmTypeVersion1.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmTypeVersion_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.guid as algorithmTypeVersion_guid , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName from algorithmParamType algorithmParamType1 join algorithmParam algorithmParam1 on algorithmParamType1.algorithmParamId = algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId join algorithmType algorithmType1 on
